debates.showAs: Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to empower the Minister for Finance to make regulations imposing certain restrictive measures in respect of securities issued by or on behalf of the State of Israel; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chumhachtú don Aire Airgeadais rialacháin a dhéanamh lena bhforchuirfear bearta sriantacha áirithe i leith urrúis arna n-eisiúint ag Stát Iosrael nó thar a cheann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Sriantacha Airgeadais (Stát Iosrael), 2025

debates.showAs: Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to repeal the provision in the Water Services Act 2017 allowing Uisce Éireann to introduce a customer charge for use of water in excess of the specified threshold amount.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’aisghairm na forála san Acht um Sheirbhísí Uisce, 2017 lena gceadaítear d’Uisce Éireann muirear custaiméara a thabhairt isteach as uisce atá de bhreis ar an méid tairsí sonraithe a úsáid.
bill.shortTitleEn: Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Uisce (Muirir Uisce a Aisghairm), 2025

debates.showAs: Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, to define its functions in relation to the preservation, restoration and management of the cultural historical quarter within the Moore Street Battlefield Area in line with the functions, aims and objectives set for it in this Act and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna i ndáil leis an gceathrú chultúir stairiúil laistigh de Limistéar Mhachaire Catha Shráid an Mhúraigh a chaomhnú, a aisiriú agus a bhainistiú de réir na bhfeidhmeanna, na n-aidhmeanna agus na gcuspóirí atá leagtha amach dó san Acht seo agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave as a consequence of domestic violence and for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997, to extend as a consequence the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015 and to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other enactments, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá de dhroim foréigean baile agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997, do leathnú na cosanta, dá dhroim sin, ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar achtacháin áirithe eile, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire Foréigin Baile), 2020

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave as a consequence of domestic violence and for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997, to extend as a consequence the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015 and to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other enactments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá de dhroim foréigean baile agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997, do leathnú na cosanta, dá dhroim sin, ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar achtacháin áirithe eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire Foréigin Baile), 2019

debates.showAs: Harbours (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Harbours Act 1996 and the Harbours Act 2015 with regard to the maximum term of office allowed to certain directors of harbours and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Cuanta, 1996 agus an Achta Cuanta, 2015 maidir leis an téarma oifige uasta a cheadaítear do stiúrthóirí cuanta áirithe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 relating to treatment of patients under the Mental Health Act 2001 and the Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006; to improve the provision of mental health services; to promote the rights of persons subject to the Mental Health Act 2001 and the Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chinnteoireacht Chuidithe (Cumas), 2015 i ndáil le cóireáil a chur ar othair faoin Acht Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus faoin Acht um an Dlí Coiriúil (Gealtacht), 2006; d'fheabhsú soláthar seirbhísí meabhairshláinte; do dhéanamh cearta daoine atá faoi réir an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus an Achta um an Dlí Coiriúil (Gealtacht), 2006 a chur chun cinn; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Comptroller and Auditor General (Accountability of Recipients of Public Funds) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to extend the power of the Comptroller and Auditor General to inspect the accounts, books and records of persons in receipt of public funds, and to provide for connected matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leathnú chumhacht an Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste chun cuntais, leabhair agus taifid daoine a fhaigheann cistí poiblí a iniúchadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Comptroller and Auditor General (Accountability of Recipients of Public Funds) (Amendment) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille an Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste (Cuntasacht Faighteoirí Cistí Poiblí) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: Céim an Choiste

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2), 2016

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: Referral to Select Committee
Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: Second Stage [Private Members]
Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Road Traffic Act 2004 to provide for an additional speed limit, an additional special speed limit and related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le luasteorainn bhreise, luasteorainn speisialta bhreise agus nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Leasú), 2015

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2014: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 1996 to provide protection to applicants who have been prohibited from availing of social housing by virtue of the applicant's legal or beneficial interest in the residence in which the applicant and respondent previously resided
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 1996, do thabhairt cosaint d'iarratasóirí atá toirmiscthe ar leas a bhaint as tithíocht shóisialta de bhua leas dlíthiúil nó tairbhiúil an iarratasóra san áit chónaithe ina raibh cónaí ar an iarratasóir agus ar an bhfreagróir roimhe sin

debates.showAs: Social Clauses in Public Procurement Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the inclusion of social clauses in all public procurement contracts, to provide opportunities for unemployed persons and apprentices, to ensure equality in the workplace in the carrying out of public contracts and to provide for sustainable development
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go n-áireofar clásail shóisialta i ngach conradh fála poiblí, do sholáthar deiseanna do dhaoine dífhostaithe agus do phrintísigh, chun comhionannas a chinntiú san áit oibre le linn conarthaí poiblí a chur i gcrích agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le forbairt inmharthana
bill.shortTitleEn: Social Clauses in Public Procurement Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chlásail Shóisialta i bhFáil Phoiblí, 2013

version.showAs: As amended in Committee/Select Committee [Dáil Éireann]

debates.showAs: Financial Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Amendment) Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: in the public interest, to provide for the amendments to the Financial Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Amendment) Act 2011 in order to provide for the reduction of the remuneration of judges, military judges, certain other office holders, Members of the Houses of the Oireachtas, public servants; amendments to the Superannuation and Pensions Act 1963 in order to provide for the withdrawal of special pension provisions for all current and future Secretaries General
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, maidir leis na leasuithe ar an Acht um Bearta Airgeadais Éigeandála ar Mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (Leasú), 2011 d'fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le luach saothair breithiúna, breithiúna míleata, sealbhóirí áirithe eile oifige, chomhaltaí Thithe an Oireachtais, seirbhíseach poiblí a laghdú; maidir le leasuithe ar an Acht Aoisliúntas agus Pinsean, 1963 d'fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le forálacha speisialta pinsin do na hArd-Rúnaithe reatha agus todhchaí go léir a tharraingt siar
bill.shortTitleEn: Financial Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Amendment) Bill 2012
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Airgeadais Éigeandála ar Mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (Leasú), 2012

debates.showAs: Local Government (Superannuation) (Consolidation) Scheme 1998 (Amendment) Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the repeal of Article 78 of the Local Government (Superannuation) (Consolidation) Scheme 1998 in order to end the provision of added years and special severance gratuity payments for city and county managers of local authorities
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hAirteagal 78 den Scéim Rialtais Áitiúil (Aoisliúntas) (Comhdhlúthú), 1998 a aisghairm d'fhonn deireadh a chur le soláthar blianta breise agus íocaíochtaí aisce téarfa speisialta le haghaidh bainisteoirí cathrach agus contae údarás áitiúil
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Scéim Rialtais Áitiúil (Aoisliúntas) (Comhdhlúthú), 1998 (Leasú), 2012
